cmd.name: RGladiator Shows
cmd.description: Allows level 6 Gladiators to be equipped in the Barracks and makes new heroes level 4
cmd.param: NameSet, Gladiator Shows, default, NameSet, RGladiator Shows, , SetsSet, levels/Hero, 4, SetsSet, levels/RGladiator, 6, SetsSet, levels/RGladiatorPunic, 6

cmd.name: Rome Training 1
cmd.description: Allows warriors to train up to level 4
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, default, SetsPlr, maxtrainlevel, 4, NamePlr, Training

cmd.name: Rome Training 2
cmd.description: Allows warriors to train up to level 8
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, , ReqPlr, Training, , SetsPlr, maxtrainlevel, 8, NamePlr, Advanced Training, default

cmd.name: Veteran Offence
cmd.description: Makes all warriors receive a Veteran offence medal (+25% damage) at the first kill
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, default, NamePlr, Veteran Offence, default

cmd.name: Veteran Defence
cmd.description: Makes all warriors receive a Veteran defence medal (+25% armor) at the first kill
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, default, NamePlr, Veteran Defence, default

cmd.name: Veteran Health
cmd.description: Makes all warriors receive a Veteran health medal (+25% health) at the first kill
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, default, NamePlr, Veteran Health, default

cmd.name: RNobility
cmd.description: All warriors who reach level 8 become level 12
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, default, NamePlr, Nobility, default, NamePlr, RNobility, , NamePlr, BNobility

cmd.name: Transition to Empire
cmd.description: Allows Julius Caesar to be hired and begin the formation of the Empire thanks to his leadership
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, default, NameSet, Transition to Empire, default, ReqPlr, Advanced Training, default, ReqPlr, Veteran Offence, default, ReqPlr, Veteran Defence, default, ReqPlr, Veteran Health, default, ReqPlr, Nobility, default, SetsSet, levels/Caesar, 35

cmd.name: Hire Caesar
cmd.description: Hires Gaius Julius Caesar himself to lead you to victory
cmd.param: 1, 1, Caesar, Transition to Empire

cmd.name: RGladiator Shows2
cmd.description: Gathers 800 food
cmd.param: NameSet, Gladiator Shows, default, NameSet, RGladiator Shows2, SetsSet, levels/RGladiator, 6, SetsSet, levels/RGladiatorPunic, 6

cmd.name: Standartization I
cmd.description: Makes all new warriors level 4 but unable to gain experience
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, default, SetsPlr, max_battle_level, 4, SetsPlr, standard_spawn_level, 4, NamePlr, Standartization I

cmd.name: Standartization II
cmd.description: Makes all new warriors level 6 but unable to gain experience
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, , ReqPlr, Standartization I, , SetsPlr, max_battle_level, 6, SetsPlr, standard_spawn_level, 6, NamePlr, Standartization II

cmd.name: Flexibility
cmd.description: Makes all new warriors level 8 and able to gain experience
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, , ReqPlr, Standartization II, , SetsPlr, max_battle_level, 0, SetsPlr, standard_spawn_level, 8, NamePlr, Flexibility, default

cmd.name: Hire Liberati
cmd.description: Hires a group of 10 Liberati
cmd.param: 10, liberatus, RLiberatus, Gladiator Shows

cmd.name: Liberati guild
cmd.description: Makes new Liberati one level higher than the most experienced you've had
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, default, NameSet, Liberati guild, default

cmd.name: Liberati triumph
cmd.description: Makes all Liberati restore 50% maximum health and gain 3 more experience every time that they kill a special unit
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, default, NamePlr, Liberati triumph, default

cmd.name: Organize tournament
cmd.description: Gathers 2000 gold and equips a group of 20 gladiators.\n"He's started selling the grain reserves"
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, default, NameSet, Organize tournament, default

cmd.name: Military Academy
cmd.description: Makes new heroes level 12
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, default, SetsSet, levels/Hero, 12, NameSet, Military Academy, default

cmd.name: Gladiator Shows
cmd.description: Allows level 6 Gladiators to be hired in the Barracks
cmd.param: NameSet, Gladiator Shows, default, SetsSet, levels/RGladiator, 6, SetsSet, levels/RGladiatorPunic, 6

cmd.name: Training
cmd.description: Allows warriors to train up to level 4
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, default, SetsPlr, maxtrainlevel, 4, NamePlr, Training

cmd.name: Advanced Training
cmd.description: Allows warriors to train up to level 8
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, , ReqPlr, Training, , SetsPlr, maxtrainlevel, 8, NamePlr, Advanced Training

cmd.name: Special training
cmd.description: Allows warriors to train up to level 12
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gladiator Shows, , ReqPlr, Advanced Training, , SetsPlr, maxtrainlevel, 12, NamePlr, Special training, default

cmd.name: Hire Liberati Punic
cmd.description: Hires a group of 10 Liberati
cmd.param: 10, liberatus, RLiberatusPunic, Gladiator Shows

cmd.name: Fights
cmd.description: Makes new Swordsmen and Archers level 4
cmd.param: NameSet, Fights, default, SetsSet, levels/GSwordsman, 4, SetsSet, levels/GArcher, 4

cmd.name: Gaul Training 1
cmd.description: Allows warriors to train up to level 4
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, default, SetsPlr, maxtrainlevel, 4, NamePlr, Training

cmd.name: Gaul Training 2
cmd.description: Allows warriors to train up to level 8
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, , ReqPlr, Training, , SetsPlr, maxtrainlevel, 8, NamePlr, Advanced Training

cmd.name: Gaul Training 3
cmd.description: Allows warriors to train up to level 12
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, , ReqPlr, Advanced Training, , SetsPlr, maxtrainlevel, 12, NamePlr, Special training, default

cmd.name: Hire Trident warrior
cmd.param: 1, 6, GTridentWarrior, Fights

cmd.name: Trident Warrior Exp1
cmd.description: Makes new Trident Warriors level 12
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, default, NameSet, Trident Warrior Exp1, , SetsSet, levels/GTridentWarrior, 12

cmd.name: Trident Warrior Exp2
cmd.description: Makes new Trident Warriors level 18

cmd.name: Trident Warrior Exp3
cmd.description: Makes new Trident Warriors level 24
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, , ReqSet, Trident Warrior Exp2, , NameSet, Trident Warrior Exp3, default, SetsSet, levels/GTridentWarrior, 24

cmd.name: Warrior Tales
cmd.description: When a non-mercenary warrior dies, all nearby allies have a 33% chance to gain 1 experience (5 with dying Trident Warrior, 10 with dying hero, both with 100% chance)
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, default, NamePlr, Warrior Tales, default

cmd.name: Battle tactics
cmd.description: Doubles the experience gained by all units at every kill
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, default, NamePlr, Battle tactics, default

cmd.name: Legendary Heroes
cmd.description: Allows legendary Heroes to be hired
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, default, NameSet, Legendary Heroes, default, ReqPlr, Special training, default, ReqSet, Trident Warrior Exp3, default, ReqPlr, Warrior Tales, default, ReqPlr, Battle tactics, default, SetsSet, levels/Keltill, 30, SetsSet, levels/Larax, 40

cmd.name: Hire Keltill
cmd.description: Hires the powerful Keltill, great Gaul chieftain
cmd.param: 1, 1, Keltill, Legendary Heroes

cmd.name: Hire Larax
cmd.description: Hires the legendary Larax, the Chosen one
cmd.param: 1, 1, Larax, Legendary Heroes

cmd.name: Tournaments
cmd.description: Makes new Militiamen and Archers level 4
cmd.param: NameSet, Tournaments, default, SetsSet, levels/IMilitiaman, 4, SetsSet, levels/IArcher, 4

cmd.name: Heroes' Wisdom
cmd.description: Increases heroes' experience over time
cmd.param: ReqSet, Tournaments, default, NamePlr, Heroes' Wisdom

cmd.name: Warriors' Wisdom
cmd.description: Increases warriors' experience over time
cmd.param: ReqSet, Tournaments, , ReqPlr, Heroes' Wisdom, , NamePlr, Warriors' Wisdom, default

cmd.name: Call Mountaineer
cmd.param: 1, mountaineer, IMountaineer, Tournaments

cmd.name: Mountain Clan
cmd.description: Increases the number of Mountaineers you can have to 20
cmd.param: ReqSet, Tournaments, default, NamePlr, Mountain Clan, , SetsPlr, MaxMountaineers, 20

cmd.name: Mountain Clan Legacy
cmd.description: Makes all new Mountaineers the same level of the most experienced you've had
cmd.param: ReqSet, Tournaments, , ReqPlr, Mountain Clan, , NamePlr, Mountain Clan Legacy, default

cmd.name: Veteran's guild
cmd.description: Equips new warriors with a Veteran ring, which becomes Veteran medal at the first kill, adding 6 and 10% damage
cmd.param: ReqSet, Tournaments, default, NameSet, Veteran's guild, default, SetsSet, items/Veteran Guild, 1

cmd.name: Nobility
cmd.description: All warriors who reach level 8 become level 12
cmd.param: ReqSet, Tournaments, default, NamePlr, Nobility, default, NamePlr, RNobility, , NamePlr, BNobility

cmd.name: People's Assembly
cmd.description: Increases the stronghold population by 15
cmd.param: NameSet, People's Assembly, default

cmd.name: Shared Strength
cmd.description: Makes new warriors of a type level 6 if you have at least 10 of the same type
cmd.param: ReqSet, People's Assembly, default, NameSet, Shared Strength

cmd.name: Shared Triumph
cmd.description: Makes new warriors of a type level 12 if you have at least 20 of the same type
cmd.param: ReqSet, People's Assembly, , ReqSet, Shared Strength, , NameSet, Shared Triumph, default

cmd.name: Train War Elephant
cmd.param: 1, elephant, CWarElephant, People's Assembly

cmd.name: Mahout School
cmd.description: Increases the number of War Elephants you can have by 1
cmd.param: People's Assembly

cmd.name: Mahout Mastery
cmd.description: Makes new War Elephants level 16
cmd.param: ReqSet, People's Assembly, default, NameSet, Mahout Mastery, default, SetsSet, levels/CWarElephant, 16

cmd.name: Spoils of war
cmd.description: Makes all warriors collect spoils of war worth 100 gold at every kill
cmd.param: ReqSet, People's Assembly, default, NamePlr, Spoils of war, default

cmd.name: Britain Fights
cmd.description: Makes new heroes level 6
cmd.param: NameSet, Fights, default, NameSet, Britain Fights, , SetsSet, levels/Hero, 6

cmd.name: BNobility
cmd.description: All warriors who reach level 8 become level 12
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, default, NamePlr, Nobility, default, NamePlr, BNobility, , NamePlr, RNobility

cmd.name: Noble Offence
cmd.description: Makes all warriors level 12 and above receive a Noble offence artifact (+8 damage) at the first kill
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, default, ReqPlr, Nobility, default, NamePlr, Noble Offence, default

cmd.name: Noble Defence
cmd.description: Makes all warriors level 12 and above receive a Noble defence artifact (+8 armor) at the first kill
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, default, ReqPlr, Nobility, default, NamePlr, Noble Defence, default

cmd.name: Hire Viking Lord
cmd.param: 1, 6, BVikingLord, Fights

cmd.name: Shrine of Thor
cmd.description: Makes new Viking Lords 2 levels higher than the last (up to level 24)
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, default, NameSet, Shrine of Thor, default, SetsSet, levels/BVikingLord, 4

cmd.name: Cult of Anubis
cmd.description: Allows Anubis warriors to be equipped in the Barracks
cmd.param: NameSet, Cult of Anubis, default

cmd.name: Statue of Isis, mother of Anubis
cmd.rollover: Statue of Isis, mother of Anubis
cmd.description: Makes all units heal twice as fast and recover 2 food at every kill
cmd.param: ReqSet, Cult of Anubis, default, NamePlr, Statue of Isis, default

cmd.name: Path of the dead I
cmd.description: Makes all warriors become at least level 4 upon killing an enemy (6 for Anubis warriors)
cmd.param: ReqSet, Cult of Anubis, default, NamePlr, Path of the dead I

cmd.name: Path of the dead II
cmd.description: Makes all warriors become at least level 8 upon killing an enemy (10 for Anubis warriors)
cmd.param: ReqSet, Cult of Anubis, , ReqPlr, Path of the dead I, , NamePlr, Path of the dead II

cmd.name: Path of the dead III
cmd.description: Makes all warriors become at least level 12 upon killing an enemy (14 for Anubis warriors)
cmd.param: ReqSet, Cult of Anubis, , ReqPlr, Path of the dead II, , NamePlr, Path of the dead III, default

cmd.name: Cult of Horus
cmd.description: Allows Horus warriors to be equipped in the Barracks
cmd.param: NameSet, Cult of Horus, default

cmd.name: Statue of Osiris, father of Horus
cmd.rollover: Statue of Osiris, father of Horus
cmd.description: Makes all units restore stamina twice as fast
cmd.param: ReqSet, Cult of Horus, default, NamePlr, Statue of Osiris, default

cmd.name: Light of Horus I
cmd.description: Makes new warriors level 2 (4 for Horus warriors)
cmd.param: ReqSet, Cult of Horus, default, SetsSet, levels/ESwordsman, 2, SetsSet, levels/EArcher, 2, SetsSet, levels/EAxetrower, 2, SetsSet, levels/EAnubisWarrior, 2, SetsSet, levels/EHorusWarrior, 4, SetsSet, levels/EGuardian, 2, SetsSet, levels/EChariot, 2, NameSet, Light of Horus I

cmd.name: Light of Horus II
cmd.description: Makes new warriors level 4 (6 for Horus warriors)
cmd.param: ReqSet, Cult of Horus, , ReqSet, Light of Horus I, , SetsSet, levels/ESwordsman, 4, SetsSet, levels/EArcher, 4, SetsSet, levels/EAxetrower, 4, SetsSet, levels/EAnubisWarrior, 4, SetsSet, levels/EHorusWarrior, 6, SetsSet,levels/EGuardian, 4, SetsSet, levels/EChariot, 4, NameSet, Light of Horus II

cmd.name: Light of Horus III
cmd.description: Makes new warriors level 6 (8 for Horus warriors)
cmd.param: ReqSet, Cult of Horus, , ReqSet, Light of Horus II, , SetsSet, levels/ESwordsman, 6, SetsSet, levels/EArcher, 6, SetsSet, levels/EAxetrower, 6, SetsSet, levels/EAnubisWarrior, 6, SetsSet, levels/EHorusWarrior, 8, SetsSet, levels/EGuardian, 6, SetsSet, levels/EChariot, 6, NameSet, Light of Horus III, default

cmd.name: Statue of Amon-Ra
cmd.description: Increases the maximum health of every unit by 5 for each level up
cmd.param: NamePlr, Statue of Amon-Ra, default, ReqSet, Cult of Anubis, default, ReqSet, Cult of Horus, default

cmd.name: TFights
cmd.description: Gathers 4000 food
cmd.param: NameSet, Fights, default, NameSet, TFights

cmd.name: Call Valkyries
cmd.description: Calls 5 Valkyries
cmd.param: 5, 10, TValkyrie, Fights

cmd.name: Legendary Valkyries
cmd.description: Makes new Valkyries one level higher than the most experienced you've had
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, default, NameSet, Legendary Valkyries, default

cmd.name: Learning
cmd.description: Makes all warriors gain 1 experience every time that they damage a more experienced enemy
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, default, NamePlr, Learning, default

cmd.name: Attack focus
cmd.description: The warriors' damage is not reduced when fighting more experienced enemies
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, default, NamePlr, Attack focus, default

cmd.name: Teuton Master
cmd.description: Allows Teuton Riders to transform into Teuton Archers and the latter into Teuton Wolves (and vice versa)
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, default, NamePlr, Teuton Master, default

cmd.name: Barbaric Tales
cmd.description: Every time that your Heroes and Valkyries kill an enemy that is at least 3 levels higher, they and all nearby allies gain 15 bonus experience
cmd.param: ReqSet, Fights, default, NamePlr, Barbaric Tales, default
